dict.acceptation: 统计资料中的一项；（一项）统计数据；统计量；（对总体具有代表性的）典型统计论；

sent.orig: DSB shall go to Beijing Yaoyang Statistic Bureau for statistic registration of the Project.
sent.trans: 由外服局至北京市朝阳区统计局办理计划统计注册手续。

sent.orig: Statistic functions have several levels such as journals, statistic of quality target and graphs.
sent.trans: 提出了统计分析具有流水帐、质量指标统计、形象图显示等不同层次要求。

sent.orig: Outside dividing daily statistic forms for reporting statistics, do not talk to statistic executes law examination.
sent.trans: 除完成日常统计报表外，根本谈不上统计执法检查。因此应大力加强农场综合统计工作。

sent.orig: But the worry that the newest statistic result of national statistic bureau dispelled people.
sent.trans: 但国家统计局的最新统计结果消除了人们的忧虑。

sent.orig: Support Vector Machine (SVM) , which based on Statistic Learning Theory, has the adaptive generation ability.
sent.trans: 建立在统计学习理论基础之上的支持向量机具有和样本数相适应的最优泛化能力。
